OpenError.description: Contains constants representing the errors that can be encountered when calling the open method on the DesktopAgent object.

ResolveError.description: Contains constants representing the errors that can be encountered when calling the findIntent, findIntentsByContext, raiseIntent or raiseIntentForContext methods on the DesktopAgent.

ResultError.description: Contains constants representing the errors that can be encountered when calling the getResult method on the IntentResolution Object.

ChannelError.description: Contains constants representing the errors that can be encountered when calling channels using the joinUserChannel or getOrCreateChannel methods, or the getCurrentContext, broadcast or addContextListener methods on the Channel object.

BridgingError.description: Contains constants representing the errors that can be encountered by Desktop Agents when exchanging bridging messages.
